name: Lost in a Dungeon
description:
You are a ghoul, trapped in a tower consisting of 4 floors filled with hostile creatures. The only way to keep peace is to find and retrieve the souls of the bosses of each floor. Do you have what it takes to escape the dungeon?

Main controls:

wasd - to move

backspace - to leave game

left click - attack

right click - dash (only available on few mobs)

space on a dead mob - take their body
